com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

Class CalendarLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.AbstractLayer
      • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.AbstractSystemLayer
        • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.CalendarLayer

  • public class CalendarLayer
extends AbstractSystemLayer
    The calendar layer is responsible for drawing the information provided by the calendar model.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.11 $
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    AbstractGanttChart.getCalendarModel()

      • setCalendarEntryRenderer

        public void setCalendarEntryRenderer(Class objectType,
                                     ICalendarEntryRenderer renderer)
        Maps the implementation of a calendar entry renderer to a calendar object definition.
        Parameters:
        objectType - the type of the calendar entries where the visual representation will be rendered with the given renderer
        renderer - an implementation that will be used to renderer instances of the given calendar entry type
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        DefaultCalendarEntryRenderer, HolidayCalendarEntry, WeekendCalendarEntry

      • getCalendarEntryRenderer

        public ICalendarEntryRenderer getCalendarEntryRenderer(Class cl)
        Returns a calendar entry renderer for a given entry type.
        Parameters:
        cl - the type of the calendar entry that is in need of rendering
        Returns:
        a matching calendar entry renderer implementation
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        setCalendarEntryRenderer(Class, ICalendarEntryRenderer), DefaultCalendarEntryRenderer

      • getCalendarEntryRendererMap
